response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit your business. Given its value and the potential it holds for you, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 12000}
